solution:
next(A,r):- my_true(A,r),does(A,robot,b),magic(r),magic(robot),magic(r),magic(b).
next(A,p):- my_true(A,q),does(A,robot,b),magic(q),magic(b),magic(p),magic(robot).
next(A,B):- my_true(A,C),my_succ(C,B).
next(A,q):- does(A,robot,a),my_true(A,q),magic(q),magic(a),magic(q),magic(robot).
next(A,p):- does(A,robot,a),not_my_true(A,p),magic(robot),magic(p),magic(a).
next(A,q):- my_true(A,r),does(A,robot,c),magic(robot),magic(r),magic(c),magic(q).
next(A,q):- my_true(A,p),does(A,robot,b),magic(q),magic(robot),magic(p),magic(b).
next(A,p):- does(A,robot,c),my_true(A,p),magic(robot),magic(p),magic(c),magic(p).
next(A,r):- my_true(A,q),does(A,robot,c),magic(c),magic(r),magic(robot),magic(q).
next(42,r):- magic(42),magic(r).
next(35,r):- magic(r),magic(35).
